tests.template: {% for a in (1..3) %}{{ a }},{% endfor %}

tests.name: array
tests.template: {% for a in b %}{{ a }},{% endfor %}

tests.template: {% for a in '123' %}{{ a }},{% endfor %}

tests.name: array, offset, equals
tests.template: {% for a in b offset=2 %}{{ a }},{% endfor %}

tests.name: array, reversed
tests.template: {% for a in b reversed %}{{ a }},{% endfor %}

tests.template: {% for a in b offset:1, limit:3, reversed %}{{ a }},{% endfor %}

tests.name: space separated arguments
